context: Ever notice how bad things always happen when the democrats are in charge?  At what point to we accept this clear sign from God and right our country by electing Christian leaders as directed by the Constitution?
Can’t be possible. I pay carbon tax and the government said that would fix everything…
California does not care...... many organizations have tried to get the government to cut trails through the dense forest to help with fires
How’s that for your lack of forest management.  Real good for the environment Newsom
With all that smoke, hopefully it will continue and circle the planet causing global cooling

The all knowing progressives in CA don't practice good forestry, and so every stinking year, wild fires there dump millions of tons of "carbon" into the air, yet they scream bloody murder about the country enabling "climate change"....  Geezus !
With all that smoke, hopefully it will continue and circle the planet causing global cooling
Yet another liberal-democrat expensive failure to do the right thing and manage the forrest instead  of having the forrest  manage them.

Earth is finally striking back at humankind! Go Earth, Go!

These fires raging all over North America and Western Europe are injecting more CO2 and H2O-vapor into the atmosphere than decades of auto emissions. Not to even mention the zillions of mega-calories of HEAT.

Newsom - democrat/CA  contributing to global warming .
That's what they get for voting for Biden.

replies.context: Hey Zippy, Siskiyou County is a Republican stronghold that voted 57%-41% for Trump.  You people are so brainwashed.  You see the word "California" and you get triggered.

context: Wonder if Newsom realizes that they can have all electric cars and it wouldn't matter because of the wildfire pollution and devastation to the environment caused by the lack of managing the forests for 30 years and building no infrastructure for retaining water since the 60's.

replies.context: State managed forests aren't the problem.  It's the 615 million acres of federally mismanaged forests in California with nobody out there raking up the leaves and sticks.
and they won't be either as long as the tree huggers oppose any kind of management
